text:
@parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You GREEDY ugly PIGs. It's probably made in C H I N A!

I thought you didn't like China. Are you all #Hypocrites?????????

These wackos said the #coronavirus was a #hoax and now they are trying to make money from it! What a joke.

#Covid_19 #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
